name: La Chupa Rosa Espinoza
description: La ChupaRosa Espinoza helps magical beings reconnect to the magic of the universe through ritual, practices, and play rooted in nature. Our continued healing allows us to move towards a supportive community that cares for the land that nourishes us.
fullDescription: La ChupaRosa Espinoza helps magical beings reconnect to the magic of the universe through ritual, practices, and play rooted in nature. Our continued healing allows us to move towards a supportive community that cares for the land that nourishes us.
